title: The Nature of heat
brief_description: Explains heat as the energy of molecular motion. Experiments are used to demonstrate that heat is transferred by conduction, convection and radiation. Shows the effectiveness of various types of material in the transfer of heat.
description: Explains heat as the energy of molecular motion. Experiments are used to demonstrate that heat is transferred by conduction, convection and radiation. Shows the effectiveness of various types of material in the transfer of heat.
